name: Unidentified Furniture Object
description:
Made to Order

Free Delivery to UK Mainland

Are you a believer? People are reporting sightings of 'Unidentified Furniture Objects' in residential dwellings from Lancashire to London! You are being invaded people....but not to worry....they come in peace, they are simply here to improve your life!

A fun, quirky yet contemporary product for the home. The Unidentified Furniture Object is a multifunctional piece, it can be used as a small side table, a stool, or something to rest your feet on! A solid oak top, hand turned to the shape of a flying saucer, sits on three tapered Oak legs.

Handmade with love in Lancashire.

Unidentified Furniture Objects are handmade to order, please allow 14 to 21 days for delivery on placing your order.

Thank you for taking the time to view my work!

Dimensions - Table top 35 cm in diameter, sitting 45 cm high.

Made from - Solid Oak

name: Nosy Board (Skinny) American Black Walnut Presentation Board
description:
In stock and ready for dispatch.

Free delivery to UK Mainland

A long slim presentation board in American Black Walnut

Serve your food up in style with this long, slim presentation board, hand carfted from one solid piece of American Black Walnut. The angled nose with a hole to one end, helps you carry your board around in one hand with ease. The long board offers ample space to lay out your food of choice, be it a cheese board or an antipasti board, the nosy board will not disapoint. Every board is unique, handmade with love in Lancashire!

Made from:
American Black Walnut, finished with three coats of food safe oil. Wipe clean with a damp cloth, oil occasssionaly to keep it looking fresh.

Dimensions:
Aprox dimensions, 500mm long, by 150mm wide, by 19mm thick.

name: Nosy Board Fat English Elm Chopping Board
description:
In stock and ready to post.

Free delivery to UK Mainland (1-2 days dispatch)

A big beautiful handmade chopping board in English Elm

Chop Chop....here we have a big chunky chopper, hand crafted to a modern contemporary shape. Made from one solid slab of English Elm, this one is for the fellas! Plenty of room to chop away all day...flip it over, one side for your meat, the other for your veg....doubles as a nice chunky serving board! Every board is unique, handmade with love in Lancashire!

Made from:
English Elm, and finished with 3 coats of food safe oil. Wipe clean with a damp cloth, oil occasionaly to keep it looking fresh!

Dimensions:
Aprox dimensions 450mm by 280mm by 25mm thick.

name: Domino Chop Handmade Presentation Board Solid Oak
description:
Here we have a beautiful handmade domino chopping board / serving presentation board in Solid Oak and American Black Walnut

Made to Order - Select your own number combination...simply drop me a message on ordering.

Be it a gift for a loved one, or a gift for yourself, this stunning, handmade, solid oak and walnut domino board may just be to nice to chop on! A good size board, suitable for presenting your cheese and crackers, or any combination of food you like....serve it in style!

Made to order, these domino boards are available in the number combination of your choice....why not order a set, and link them up down the centre of your dinning table!

Made from:
Made from one solid slab of Oak, inlayed with American Black Walnut. Finished with three coats of food safe oil, and sanded to beautifuly smooth finish. Wipe clean with a damp cloth (do not submerge in water)

Dimensions:
440mm in length, by 220mm wide, by 25mm thick.

Please allow 7-10 days for delivery (Free to UK Mainland)

name: Allsorts Hang-it-up Coat Rack/Hooks
description:
Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

Allsorts Hang-it-up 

Inspired by Liquorice Allsorts, this cute coat rack brings a little fun to your hallway! Made from a variety of timbers, Purple Heart Wood, Mahogany and oak.

These Purple Heart Allsorts are avialable in a limited quantity....I plan to standardise the design for batch production, and the wood used to create the contrast may change, due to timber supplies (Purple Heart wood and Mahogany are not readily available)

Hand Made with Love in Lancashire!

Thank You for taking the time to view my work!

Red Thumb Print is on Facebook...link at bottom of page.

name: Desk De Stijl
description:
Made to Order

Better Images Coming Soon!

Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

Inspired by the Dutch designer Gerrit Rietveld and the Artistic movement known as De Stijl....translation...The Style. De Stijl was founded in the 1920's and paved the way for Early Modernism and The Bauhaus. In designing this desk, I tried to stick with the design principles set out by De Stijl, whilst softening the pallet and bringing it bang up to date in my use of materials. The result is a beautiful bespoke desk that would grace any home with its presence....Desk De Stijl has been featured in Good Woodworking Magazine and Lancashire Life Magazine.

The desk is made from Pippy Oak, and features an accent of Red to set it off. The frame of the desk wraps around two finger jointed boxes, housing drawers...these provide ample storage. The jointing of the boxes is a visual treat...a real feature when viewed from the the side. The drawers have Spalted Burr Oak handles, providing a lovely contrast against the Pippy Oak. The frame of the desk overlaps itself at every junction,  echoing De Stijl. The ends of the frame components are finished with red acrylic, this is a nod to the colour spectrum used by De Stijl. The desk top really celebrates the Pippy Oak, showing off its wonderful wild grain pattern, and also provides plentiful work space. The desk features a shelf to the back, visually, it appears to float and really finishes the desk off! The shelf is set at the correct height to house your monitor, or you can simply display your objects here! I am really proud of this desk...it is perfectly proportioned and has a real visual impact, whilst still fulfilling its function!

Avialable in other timbers/colours on request....pricing may vary.

Desk De Stijl stands 70 cm off the ground, 142 cm wide and 52 cm deep. These measurements can be altered to your specifications on request. Price is for a desk in Pippy Oak, as shown. Pricing on other timbers may vary.

Made to order with a making time of 6-8 weeks. Any questions I am happy to hear from you.

Thank You for taking the time to view my work!

Red Thumb Print is on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/redthumbprinthandmadefurniture

name: Woodbot Drinks Cabinet / Sideboard
description:
Made to Order

Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

The Woodbot RTP2013 - Drinks Cabinet / Sideboard by Red Thumb Print. He is constructed from solid oak, with the contrasting details being made up of various exotic timbers, including Purple Heart wood, Paduak, Laburnum, Mahogany and Spalted Beech. He offers two cabinets for storage....the head is designed to store your bottles ect, the doors open out and the hatch opens up at the top, allowing easy access to bottles at the back of the cabinet. The body cabinet is designed to store a collection of glasses, needed to construct your drink of choice. When the RTP2013 is not in use, his key is stored safely away in the side of the cabinet....however when it is drinks time, this is removed from the side and slotted into the front, becoming a work surface for constructing your beverages! The RTP2013 is well grounded on solid oak legs, set on castors, or roller skates as I like to call them....allowing you to wheel him around to your chosen location. 

Available in other timbers on request...pricing may vary. 

This design can also be adapted to suite your needs, any questions, I am happy to hear from you. More pictures available on request...or visit the Red Thumb Print Facebook Page! 

Avialable on commission with a making time of around 8 - 10 weeks.

The RTP2013 is on display at a furniture exhibition, running from June 12th until July 4th, along with other pieces by Red Thumb Print. Information on exhibition can be found on the Red Thumb Print Facebook page. 

https://www.facebook.com/redthumbprinthandmadefurniture

Thank You for taking the time to view my work!

name: 3X60 Hand Made Box in Mahogany, Satin Wood and Padauk
description:
Made to Order 

Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

A Hand Made Box in Mahogany, Satin Wood and Padauk. The main construction of the box is mahogany, with an inlayed stripe detail of satin wood, and padauk veneers to the base and the lid. The contrast of these exotic timbers creates a very striking effect......I hope you agree! As you can see from the pictures the box is triangular in shape and swings open on a pivot hinge from the top corner.....it measures 8inches on all sides and is 3 inches deep, an ample size box, it can be used as a jewelry box, trinket box or stash box. 

Commission a box....

I am happy to create a unique box for you, just drop me a message and we will discuss design, materials and price.

To give you some idea of pricing....this box was created for £160.

Thank You for taking the time to view my work!

Red Thumb Print is on Facebook   www.facebook.com/redthumbprinthandmadefurniture.

name: Xample Chair Number Two
description:
Made to Order

Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

Xample Chair Number Two - Made from English Olive Ash, this unique chair features a yellow pollycord string seat, an interactive picture frame backrest, Purple Heart Wood key joints and wedge joints....a chair hand crafted with Love....one you won't find on the high street! A fresh, modern design...one that adopts traditional methods of construction. The legs, and the backrest supports, are wedge jointed into the x-frame...a very strong joint...one that also provides a contrasting decorative detail to the piece. The yellow string gives a burst of colour, and creates a very comfortable seating area. The backrest doubles as an interactive picture frame!

Interactive Picture Frame Backrest Explained....The frame is the perfect size to fit a 12" record, enabling you to display your favorite album art....the record is framed by a mount within the picture frame, for a professional look! The chair comes with two mounts, the other one allowing you to display an A4 print....Portrait or landscape! It is simple to change your record / chosen artwork....the mitered frame slides out from the side, you change the artwork and slide it back in....easy!


This chair is sold, however it is possible to create one that looks similar...not exactly the same....Price shown refers to a chair made from Oak or Ash....Walnut and other timbers will be slightly more...

Please take a look through the other Xample Chairs....I have unique models for sale or.....

Commission Your Own Chair.

Each chair is unique, 100% hand made by me, numbered and marked with my Red Thumb Print! Each Chair is a variation of one design....the X-frame of the chair being the heart of the construction....with a number of options for the seat and the backrest. The Xample Chair is available in a number of different hardwoods....Oak, Ash, Walnut...or any other you like!?! The key joints add a little contrast to the chair....these too can be chosen by you! I offer options on the seat and the backrest....String, Upholstery, Solid wood or something a little different?

All enquiries welcome....Guide Price £400- £600

Chairs made to order....3-4 weeks delivery (Free to UK Mainland)

Thank You for taking the time to view my work.

Red Thumb Print is on Facebook www.facebook.com/redthumbprinthandmadefurniture.

name: Low Back Lounge (Chair)
description:
Made to Order

Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

Low Back Lounge chair, featuring solid Oak legs / armrests, and a grey/yellow check fabric from Harlequin. Designed and made for Red Thumb Print by David James Shackleton, this is a unique chair, one you will not find on the high street!

The chair appears to float inside the solid Oak legs / armrests. Its low to the ground, deep and wide....allowing you to really kick back and relax in comfort! The frame of the chair is constructed from solid hardwood, it is fully sprung and is filled with the best quality foam on the market. Carefully upholstered, to match up the pattern of this soft, fresh, zingy yellow/grey fabric from Harlequin! The legs / armrests in solid oak are finished with oil / wax, bringing out the woods natural beauty....they are fixed out of sight, from the inside, giving the chair a really clean, contemporary look!

Also available in other fabrics from the Harlequin Folia Checks and Stripes collection...link below.

http://www.harlequin.uk.com/folia-checks-and-stripes.aspx

Commission your own Chair...

If you wish to source your own fabric and commission your own chair, this is not a problem....please make contact and we will discuss pricing, all enquiries welcome!

Chairs made to order....3-4 weeks delivery.

Thank You for taking the time to view my work.

Red Thumb Print is on Facebook www.facebook.com/redthumbprinthandmadefurnitur

name: Woodbot RTP001 - Doorstop
description:
Designed and Made by One Man.....A Man With a Red Thumb Print!

Made to Order

The Woodbotz Are Coming!!!!

Cute little Woodbot - RTP001 is made from solid oak. A variety of exotic timbers make up the details, including Purple Heart, Spalted Beech, Mahogany, Burr Elm and Laburnum wood.

The Woodbotz are all one off, unique pieces. Here at Red Thumb Print, it is simply not acceptable to throw away off cuts of beautiful wood...I decided to get creative with them, inspired by vintage toy robots, these little woodbotz are the result! They adopt a number of forms....door stops, clocks and boxes....some have no use at all, they are simply little characters to help raise a smile!

If there are no Woodbots listed for sale, You can commission me to create one just for you....drop me a message for more details!

Thank You for taking the time to view my work.

Red Thumb Print is on Facebook www.facebook.com/redthumbprinthandmadefurniture.
